text: The Clockmaker (, also known as The Clockmaker of St. Paul and The Watchmaker of St. Paul) is a 1974 French crime drama movie directed by first time director Bertrand Tavernier and was based on the 1954 novel L'Horloger d'Everton by Georges Simenon. It stars Philippe Noiret, Jean Rochefort, Jacques Denis, Yves Afonso, Julien Bertheau, Jacques Hilling. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 crime drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Tavernier
title: The Clockmaker
